verbs.description: [ARG0: WEST PALM BEACH] , Fla. — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he 's considering a posthumous pardon for boxing 's first black heavyweight champion more than 100 years after the late Jack Johnson was convicted by all - white jury of accompanying a white woman across state lines] .
